description: This table stores the medication usage narrative for a pharmacogenomic variant.

columns.name: VARIANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the variant record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the medication usage narrative for a pharmacogenomic variant. Together with VARIANT_ID, this forms the foreign key to the VAR_PGX_MED_USE_NARR table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of a portion of the medication usage narrative associated with the pharmacogenomic variant and medication from the VAR_PGX_MED_USE table

columns.name: MED_USE_NARRATIVE
columns.description: Free text field denoting alteration to medication based on drug-gene interactions
